评论详情: After my last purchase and being disappointed by it, I was not holding out much hope that this would actually fit me, just say that I'm impressed as an understatement because the jacket actually fit and it looks nice and it's really good quality, the only thing I would change is how the buttons are secured on the jacket, definitely need to secure the buttons a little bit better, I bought the 5xl and it actually fit me, I normally wear a 3XL but figured two sizes up would actually fit me and I was not disappointed, so I would actually buy two sizes up from what you normally wear.
I used this for Halloween as part of Westley  Snipes Blade costume and everyone loved it

I ordered an 5xl I got it and I wear  between lg to 2xl the jacket was for my husband he wears between 3xl to a 4xl  so I ordered a 5xl because you know what they say everything always runs smaller online but I didn't expect it to run that small it wouldn't even fit it barely fit me.
It’s perfect size and works well, but smells. I must’ve sprayed it a dozen times with cleaner, left it outside hanging for a few hours, and still smelled. Wore it once and only once but it’s a coat.
Is not leather. More like vinyl. Size is not even close to accurate. Quality is more plastic than anything else. Very cheaply made. Super disappointed.

OK, No será cuero, lo sabes antes de comprarlo, pero por el relación precio producto van bien. no huele a nada, es sueve y viste. Dos cosas que no van acorde, el tamaño pídelo una talla arriba para que no tengas problemas, y dos los botones plateado terminan aquedándote, pero en general, si va. creo que los que están en una estrella exageran la nota. me costo 30
